item.title: Addergrease Armor
item.fluff: The worn leather of this armor gleams with toxic grease

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Effect: The triggering enemy takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends), and you shift a number of squares equal to this armor's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 18: Ongoing 10 poison damage.
Level 23 or 28: Ongoing 15 poison damage.

item.title: Agile Resolve Vestments
item.fluff: These embroidered vestments channel your resolve to imbue you with agility

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 item bonus to Reflex.

item.title: Armor of Aegis Expansion
item.fluff: Flecks of magical force swirl around this light armor, coalescing to deflect attacks against you and your companions

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: A creature you have marked with your Aegis of Shielding targets you and at least one of your allies with an attack
Effect: The damage from the triggering attack is reduced by 5 + the armor's enhancement bonus.
Level 12 or 17: 10 + the armor's enhancement bonus
Level 22 or 27: 15 + the armor's enhancement bonus

item.title: Armor of Cleansing
item.fluff: The exterior of this armor is covered with symbols of healing, while the interior has many silken bands that cradle you comfortable and move to ease your suffering

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage.

item.title: Armor of Dark Majesty
item.fluff: This armor is studded with gleaming brass studs that flicker with hellish energies when you cast a spell

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to all defeneses against enemies under your Warlock's Curse.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Ranged sight (one creature); You place your curse on the target. This counts as using your your warlock's curse, including the limit of only once per turn.

item.title: Armor of Durability
item.fluff: When your allies rely on you to keep fighting, this armor helps keep you in the fray

item.title: Armor of Dwarven Vigor
item.fluff: This armor, which appears to be crafted of chiseled stone, grants you the endurance of a dwarf warrior

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must have your second wind available
Effect: You use your second wind, and regain an additional 1d6 hit points per plus of the armor.
Special: If you have the Dwarven Resilience racial trait, you can use this power as a free action on your turn instead.

item.title: Armor of Escape
item.fluff: Thanks to this armor, you shrug off shackles and bindings as easily as you would remove a pair of breeches

block.name: Property
block.line: This armor cannot be removed without your consent while you're living.

item.title: Armor of Exploits
item.fluff: The arcane symbols etched into this armor's surface glow brightly as the item unleashes a previously stored power

block.name: Property
block.line: When you finish a short or extended rest wearing this armor, choose one at-will martial power or encounter martial power known by you or an ally and that has a level. The armor stores the chosen power.

The armor cannot store a power of a higher level than the armor, and you cannot use the armor's power if the power's level is higher than your level. The armor cannot store powers used as immediate or free action.

Once the power is used, another power must be stored in the armor before the armor's power can be used again. If a new power is stored before the old one is used, the old exploit is replaced by the new one.

block.name: Attack or Utility Power
block.line: You use the power stored in the armor. If the stored power is an encounter power, you must spend an action point to use it.
This power is an attack power or a utility power depending on which type of power was stored.
This power has the same keywords as the stored power.
Using this power is the same action as using the stored power.

item.title: Armor of Eyes
item.fluff: The eyes carved on this heavy armor constantly watch for incoming attacks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy targets you with an attack and has combat advantage for the attack
Effect: You don't grant combat advantage to the triggering enemy for the triggering attack.
If the triggering attack can only target a creature granting combat advantage, you are no longer a valid target.

item.title: Armor of Resistance
item.fluff: Special wards in this armor provide extra resistance

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 against a single damage type. The damage type is chosen from the following list when the armor is created:
acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, thunder

item.title: Armor of Sudden Recovery
item.fluff: You shrug off conditions easily in this supple armor

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must be taking ongoing damage
Effect: The ongoing damage ends, and you gain regeneration equal to the ongoing damage. The regeneration lasts until the end of the encounter.

item.title: Astral Fire Armor
item.fluff: The small crystals in the links of this armor glitter like stars, and when exposed to divine energy they flare and fill you with defensive power

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use a Channel Divinity power, you gain a +2 item bonus to AC and Fortitude until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Awakening Armor
item.fluff: This plain-looking armor lets you foresee ambushes

block.name: Property
block.line: While bloodied, you gain a +1 bonus to Will.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You are surprised
Effect: You are no longer surprised.

item.title: Bestial Armor
item.fluff: Crafted from the skin, fur and bones of cave bears, this armor gives its wearer relentlessnes when pursuing prey

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit with a charge attack
Effect: You make a melee basic attack against the same target, with a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.

item.title: Breaching Armor
item.fluff: Walls are no obstacle for you while wearing this armor

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must be adjacent to a wall.

Effect: You teleport to the other side of the wall. This teleport does not require line of sight and moves you no more than 3 squares, allowing you to teleport past a wall no more than 2 squares thick.
If you attempt to teleport into an occupied square or past a wall that is too thick, you go nowhere. Your move action is spent, but you regain this power when you next take a short rest.

item.title: Coruscating Armor
item.fluff: This glittering steel armor masks your exact location from enemies that would impede you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you don't provoke opportunity attacks and can't be grabbed. This power doesn't end an existing grab.

item.title: Curseforged Armor
item.fluff: In ancient days, the tieflings poured their bitterness into their forges as a lesson to those who would betray them

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy hits you with an attack
Effect: The triggering enemy takes a -3 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Aftereffect: -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

item.title: Deathsteel Armor
item.fluff: Crafted from death ore drawn from teh Gol Mountains in the Shadowfell, this armor protects the wearer from necromantic energy that suffuses the plane.

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 necrotic, and a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that include ongoing necrotic damage.
Level 12 or 17: Resist 10.
Level 22 or 27: Resist 15.

item.title: Dwarven Armor
item.fluff: Crafted by the finest dwarven armorsmiths of old, this armor is decorated with the faces of dwarven ancestors

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

item.title: Elusive Armor
item.fluff: This armor offers no purchase to foes that would pin you down

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 bonus to escape checks.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You become immobilized
Effect: You are no longer immobilized, and you shift 1 square.
Augment 1: Shift a number of squares up to one-half your speed.

item.title: Enduring Spirit Vestments
item.fluff: The divine power imbued in these vestments inures you to damage

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Heal checks made to aid you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You use a Channel Divinity power
Effect: You gain a +2 item bonus to AC until the end of the encounter. Also, you regain 5 hit points.
Level 12 or 17: Regain 10 hit points.
Level 22 or 27: Regain 15 hit points.

item.title: Gleaming Armor
item.fluff: When you're wounded, the energy infusing this crystalline armor flares, momentarily dazzling your enemies

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You take damage from an attack
Effect: You gain concealment until the start of the triggering attacker's next turn.
Augment 1: You regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

item.title: Haunted Armor
item.fluff: At first glance, this looks like a standard suit of armor, yet still you sense a strange, disquieting presence about it

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to death saving throws.
This bonus increases by +1 for each death saving throw you have made during the current encounter.

item.title: Hero's Armor
item.fluff: This glimmering armor fortifies those who take bold action in battle

block.name: Property
block.line: When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also gain a +2 item bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: you spend an action points
Effect: You forgo the bonus to all defenses granted by this armor's property.
Instead, one ally of your choice within 5 squares of you can use his or her second wind as a free reaction.

item.title: Horn Tusk Armor
item.fluff: Short tusks protrude from this armor's shoulder guards, signifying its ability to grant you the resilience of a boar: you are allowed an attack even as a foe drops you

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy reduces you to 0 hit points or fewer
Effect: You make a melee basic attack with a bonus to the attack roll and damage roll equal to this armor's plus.
Even if your attack prevents the triggering enemy from finishing its action, your hit points are still reduced.

item.title: Hunting Beast Armor
item.fluff: This armor carries within it the spirit of a hunting beast that guides your movements when you change into beast form

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are in beast form, you gain a +2 item bonus to Reflex.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You shift 2 squares.

item.title: Immunizing Armor
item.fluff: This sleek, white armor gives its wearer a sense of physical purity, as if he or she might resist even the deadliest poisons and diseases

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 poison, and gain a +5 item bonus to saving throws against Poison effects.
Level 12 or 17: Resist 10 poison.
Level 22 or 27: Resist 15 poison.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You are subject to a Poison effect
Effect: The triggering effect immediately ends.

item.title: Indomitable Resolve Vestments
item.fluff: These embroidered vestments channel your resolve and imbue you with willpower and determination

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 item bonus to Will.

item.title: Luring Withdrawal Armor
item.fluff: Crafted from the essence of wind elementals, this armor allows you to withdraw from a foe and lure it into a trap

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An adjacent enemy misses you with a melee attack
Effect: You shift 1 square, and then slide the triggering enemy into the space you vacated.

item.title: Magic Armor
item.fluff: A set of basic yet effective enchanted armor

item.title: Martyr's Armor
item.fluff: This crimson-tinted armor empowers its wearer to protect allies even at the expense of his or her own safety

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You take a -1 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.
While you have this penalty, allies adjacent to you gain a +1 power bonus to AC.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An ally adjacent to you is targeted by an attack against AC
Effect: You take a penalty to AC equal to 1 + this armor's plus, and the triggering ally gains an equal power bonus to AC. Both modifiers last until the start of the triggering enemy's next turn.

item.title: Mind Hunter's Armor
item.fluff: This suit of pitted mail carries the scars of the fight against the Far Realm, and protects againsts effects that tear at the mind

block.name: Property
block.line: While you have at least 1 power point, you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that daze, dominate, or stun you, or that knock you unconscious.

item.title: Mithral Armor
item.fluff: Mithral armor shines like polished silver, and most who use it claim it has saved them on more than one occasion

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You are hit by a melee or ranged attack
Effect: You take half damage from the triggering attack.

item.title: Mithral Plating
item.fluff: The lightweight metal protects your vitals while still allowing you maximum flexibility and full range of motion

headline.name: Attached Component
headline.text: You must have the Living Construct racial trait to use this item.

block.name: Property
block.line: This armor has no armor check penalty or speed penalty.

item.title: Rat Killer's Armor
item.fluff: This fur-rimmed jacket is favored by all who must deal with dangerous vermin

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 all against attacks from swarms.
Level 12 or 17: Resist 10 all.
Level 22 or 27: Resist 15 all.
In addition, you can move through a space occupied by a swarm, and your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from swarms.

item.title: Razor Armor
item.fluff: Jutting spikes and sharp edges cover each scale set into this armor

block.name: Property
block.line: When an enemy scores a critical hit against you with a melee attack, that enemy takes damage equal to 1d10 + your Dexterity modifier. This counts as melee Weapon damage if the attacker has resistance or other qualities related to it.
Level 12 or 17: Equal to 2d10 + your Dexterity modifier.
Level 22 or 27: Equal to 3d10 + your Dexterity modifier.

item.title: Repulsion Armor
item.fluff: Inlaid with esoteric runes, this armor can repel even the most persistent foes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can use the following action at-will:
Immediate Interrupt: Trigger: An enemy moves into a square adjacent to you; You push the triggering enemy 1 square.
Level 22 or 27: 2 squares.

item.title: Robe of Avoidance
item.fluff: When an enemy's attack misses you, this billowing robe confuses the foe so that you can get away

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Effect: You shift 1 square.

item.title: Robe of Eyes
item.fluff: This fine silk cloth appears to be covered in swirls of color or peacock feather patterns, but in fact depicts dozens of unblinking eyes

block.name: Property
block.line: You cannot be blinded.

item.title: Robe of Scintillation
item.fluff: Made of fine silks, this robe sheds light when you want it to, and it can also unleash a swirling melange of color that befuddles foes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: The robe radiates colored lights, illuminating like a torch.
You can end the illumination as a free action.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: The robe shines bright with myriad colors
Attack: Close burst 2 (each creature in burst); item's level +5 vs. Will
Hit: The target is dazed (save ends).
Miss: The target cannot take opportunity actions until the end of its next turn.

item.title: Robe of Useful Items
item.fluff: No matter what simple item you need, you can find it in one of this rove's many pockets

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You procure one nonmagical item worth up to 10 gp (with the DM's approval) from the robe. The item is generic (a torch or a rope, for instance), not a specific item (the key to a particular chest). The item lasts for 1 hour, then disappears.
Recharge: When the item disappears, you regain the use of this power.

item.title: Savage Armor
item.fluff: Grotesque faces contort on this armor's surface, howling with glee as the battle begins

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: You shrieak, and your armor howls with you
Effect: Close burst 1 (each enemy adjacent to you); You push each target 1 square.
Level 22 or 27: 2 squares.

item.title: Screaming Armor
item.fluff: This impressive armor is covered in ornate patterns of screaming faces, enhancing your ability to shatter your foe's resolve

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 5 (one creature that can hear you); The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
If you have training in the Intimidate skill, the penalty is (save ends) instead.

item.title: Shadow Hunter Hide
item.fluff: This shimmering black hide armor allows you to get the drop on your foes

block.name: Property
block.line: You can move 4 squares (instead of 2) during an action while you are hidden without taking a -5 penalty to Stealth checks.

item.title: Slick Armor
item.fluff: It's hard to get a hold on you while you wear this armor

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain an untyped bonus to escape attempts equal to this armor's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Property
block.line: When you spend an action point, you gain a +1 item bonus to all attack rolls and defenses until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must have an action point available
Effect: You spend an action point to regain one encounter power of your choice.

item.title: Vigorous Resolve Vestments
item.fluff: These embroided vestments channel your resolve and imbue you with resilience

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude.

item.title: Warding Spirit Armor
item.fluff: The primal power infused within this leather armor draws power from your spirit companion to shield you from attack when your guard is down

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to AC against opportunity attacks while your spirit companion is present in the encounter.
The bonus increases to +4 if your spirit companion is within 2 squares of you.
